name: Professional Art Dealing
description: Identifies professional dealers in art, fine art, antiques, antiquities, and artefacts with SIAP classification assessment. Evaluates object characteristics including rarity, value, cultural significance, and risk of illicit activity.
field: art, antique, antiquity, auction, gallery, fine art, artefact, dealer, museum, collection

Q1.text: Is the client directly involved in art through their business activity?
Q1.summary: Art Involvement Verification - Is the client involved in art business?

Q2.text: Is the client involved in the professional sale of fine art, antiques, antiquities, or artefacts?
Q2.summary: Art Activity Type - Professional sale check

Q3.text: Is the client involved in the professional brokerage of fine art, antiques, antiquities, or artefacts?
Q3.summary: Art Activity Type - Professional brokerage check

Q4.text: Is the client involved in the professional auction of fine art, antiques, antiquities, or artefacts?
Q4.summary: Art Activity Type - Professional auction check

Q5.text: Is the client involved in the professional storage of fine art, antiques, antiquities, or artefacts?
Q5.summary: Art Activity Type - Professional storage check

Q6.text: Are the objects dealt rare, special, made of expensive material, or high-valued?
Q6.summary: Object Characteristics - Rarity and value check

Q7.text: Are the objects under restrictions or protections, or do they represent inheritance of culture or civilization?
Q7.summary: Object Characteristics - Cultural protection and heritage check

Q8.text: Are the objects made using expensive techniques or listed in catalogues of antiquarians, auction houses, art galleries, or museums?
Q8.summary: Object Characteristics - Techniques and catalogue listing check

Q9.text: Are the objects attractive for forgery, looting, or smuggling?
Q9.summary: Object Characteristics - Illicit activity risk check

Q10.text: Does the client have direct engagement in the art dealing activity (not just passive ownership or investment)?
Q10.summary: Direct Engagement - Active art dealing involvement check

Q11.text: Does the income from art dealing activity represent more than 10% of the client's total income?

Q1_NO.reason: Client is not involved in art business

Q5_NO.reason: Client not involved in professional art dealing (sale, brokerage, auction, or storage)

Q9_NO.reason: Objects do not meet SIAP criteria (not rare, valuable, protected, or at risk for illicit activity)

Q10_NO.reason: No direct engagement in art dealing (passive ownership or investment only)

Q11_YES.reason: Direct professional art dealing engagement with income >10% requires Enhanced Due Diligence

Q11_NO.reason: Direct professional art dealing engagement but income <=10% - SIAP without Enhanced Due Diligence
